title: 服务器崩了
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 15-6-4 上午6:05
Description: Exception in server tick loop

cpw.mods.fml.common.registry.GameRegistryException: Failed to load the world - there are fatal block and item id issues
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLContainer.readData(FMLContainer.java:193)
        at cpw.mods.fml.common.FMLCommonHandler.handleWorldDataLoad(FMLCommonHandler.java:386)
        at net.minecraft.world.storage.SaveHandler.func_75757_d(SaveHandler.java:142)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71247_a(MinecraftServer.java:344)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:292)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:622)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.7.2
        Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_75, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 366139720 bytes (349 MB) / 663748608 bytes (633 MB) up to 954728448 bytes (910 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xms512M -Xmx1024M
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        FML: MCP v9.01-pre FML v7.2.116.36 Minecraft Forge 10.12.0.1033 5 mods loaded, 5 mods active
        mcp{8.09} [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available
        FML{7.2.116.36} [Forge Mod Loader] (mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.4-forge1033-B51.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available
        Forge{10.12.0.1033} [Minecraft Forge] (mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.4-forge1033-B51.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available
        flansmod{4.2.3} [flansmod] ([枪械前置]Flans Mod-1.7.2-4.2.3.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available
        customnpcs{1.7.2-2} [CustomNpcs] ([自定义NPC]CustomNPCs_1.7.2.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Player Count: 0 / 20; []
        Is Modded: Definitely; Server brand changed to 'mcpc,craftbukkit,fml,forge'
        Type: Dedicated Server (map_server.txt)复制代码

replies.author: RecursiveG
replies.txt_content: 你有对mod做过改动？试着还原下mod，再不行就试试换地图。。。

RecursiveG 发表于 2015-6-4 11:19
你有对mod做过改动？试着还原下mod，再不行就试试换地图。。。
我对mod没有做过改动
只是在开服之前
我自己创建了mods文件夹和Flan文件夹把我要放的东西都放进去之后才开始第一次开服
